snippet: A group of economists called permabears offer what they say are more realistic assessments of the economy and the tepid pace of the recovery.
abstract: Skeptical group of economists known as 'permabears' offer what they say are more realistic assessments of the economy and the tepid pace of the recovery, pointing to the disappointing March jobs report as evidence of their position; some go so far as to claim that the economy is likely to decline even further through the end of 2012.
lead_paragraph: A group of economists called permabears offer what they say are more realistic assessments of the economy and the tepid pace of the recovery.

headline.main: Some Dreary Forecasts From Recovery Skeptics
headline.print_headline: In a Mixed Jobs Report, Ammunition for All Sides on the Economy: Dreary Forecasts From Recovery Skeptics
